Display.Description: Discover targets by running scripts on remote node

a string containing an identifying stamp pattern which is combined with the INCLUDES config param to scan for a file. The list of INCLUDE inputs (INCL1, INCL2, INCL3...) and the STAMP input (STMP) are combined to make the search pattern starting from all of the filesystem roots accessible to the JVM in which the method is running: SEARCH PATTERN = (INCL1 | INCL2 | INCL3 | ...) & STMP
list of patterns which define which files and directories are to be considered.
